info.name: MBankingCore Admin API
info.description:
üîß **ADMIN-ONLY API Collection** for MBankingCore running on PORT 8080

## üéØ Admin Features Coverage:
- ‚úÖ Admin Authentication (Login/Logout)
- ‚úÖ Admin Dashboard with comprehensive statistics
- ‚úÖ Admin CRUD Management
- ‚úÖ Transaction Monitoring & Management
- ‚úÖ Transaction Reversal Operations
- ‚úÖ Configuration Management
- ‚úÖ Admin Content Management (Terms & Privacy Policy)
- ‚úÖ Audit Trails & Security Monitoring
- ‚úÖ User Management (Admin view)
- ‚úÖ Admin User Balance Top-up

## üìä Admin Dashboard Statistics:
- üë• Total Users: 6,067+
- üë®‚Äçüíº Total Admins: 50+
- üí≥ Total Transactions: 35,375+
- üí∞ Transaction Analytics by time periods
- üìà Performance metrics and trends

## üîê Admin Authentication Flow:
1. **Admin Login** ‚Üí Submit admin credentials and get admin access_token
2. **Get Dashboard** ‚Üí View comprehensive system statistics
3. **Access Admin Endpoints** ‚Üí Full admin operations
4. **Admin Logout** ‚Üí Invalidate admin session

## üõ†Ô∏è Admin Management Operations:
- **Get All Admins** ‚Üí List all administrators with pagination
- **Get Admin by ID** ‚Üí Retrieve specific admin details
- **Create Admin** ‚Üí Add new administrator account
- **Update Admin** ‚Üí Modify admin account details
- **Delete Admin** ‚Üí Remove administrator account

## üí≥ Transaction Management:
- **Get All Transactions** ‚Üí Monitor all user transactions with filtering
- **Reverse Transaction** ‚Üí Reverse any transaction type with reason
- **Admin Topup User Balance** ‚Üí Admin can top-up user balance directly
- **Transaction Analytics** ‚Üí View transaction trends and statistics

## üë• User Management (Admin Only):
- **Get All Users** ‚Üí List all users with advanced search and filtering
- **Get User by ID** ‚Üí Retrieve specific user details
- **Admin Topup User Balance** ‚Üí Top-up user balance with admin privileges

## ‚öôÔ∏è Configuration Management:
- **Get All Configs** ‚Üí List all system configuration values
- **Get Config by Key** ‚Üí Retrieve specific configuration value
- **Set Config** ‚Üí Create or update configuration values
- **Delete Config** ‚Üí Remove configuration values
- **Admin Terms & Conditions** ‚Üí Manage admin-specific terms and conditions
- **Admin Privacy Policy** ‚Üí Manage admin-specific privacy policy

## üîç Audit & Security Monitoring:
- **Get Audit Logs** ‚Üí Review all system activities with filtering
  - Filter by entity type (user, transaction, admin, etc.)
  - Filter by action (CREATE, READ, UPDATE, DELETE)
  - Filter by user/admin ID, date range, IP address
  - Pagination support for large datasets
- **Get Login Audit Logs** ‚Üí Monitor authentication activities
  - Filter by login type (user_login, admin_login, logout)
  - Filter by status (success, failed, blocked)
  - Device information and failure reasons

## üö® Security Features:
- JWT Token-based authentication
- Role-based access control
- Comprehensive audit trails
- Failed login monitoring
- IP address tracking
- Device session management

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notes:
- **Admin Token Required** ‚Üí All endpoints require admin authentication
- **Role Permissions** ‚Üí Different admin roles may have different permissions
- **Audit Compliance** ‚Üí All admin actions are logged for security
- **Rate Limiting** ‚Üí Admin actions may be rate-limited for security

## üîß Environment Variables Required:
- `base_url` ‚Üí Server base URL (http://localhost:8080)
- `admin_email` ‚Üí Admin email for login
- `admin_password` ‚Üí Admin password for login
- `admin_token` ‚Üí Admin access token (auto-set after login)
- `admin_id` ‚Üí Admin ID (auto-set after login)
- `admin_role` ‚Üí Admin role (auto-set after login)
- `config_key` ‚Üí Configuration key for config operations
- `config_value` ‚Üí Configuration value for config operations
- `admin_terms_content` ‚Üí Admin terms & conditions content
- `admin_privacy_content` ‚Üí Admin privacy policy content
- `target_user_id` ‚Üí User ID for admin operations (topup, etc.)
- `topup_amount` ‚Üí Amount to topup user balance
- `topup_description` ‚Üí Description for topup transaction

## üìã Testing Order:
1. **Admin Authentication** ‚Üí Login to get admin token
2. **Dashboard Overview** ‚Üí View system statistics
3. **Admin Management** ‚Üí CRUD operations on admin accounts
4. **Configuration Management** ‚Üí Manage system settings and content
5. **Transaction Monitoring** ‚Üí View and manage transactions
6. **Admin User Balance Management** ‚Üí Top-up user balances
7. **Transaction Reversal** ‚Üí Reverse transactions if needed
8. **Audit Review** ‚Üí Monitor system activities and security
9. **Admin Logout** ‚Üí Clean session termination
